author: Fextralife
description:
The Outer Worlds 2 Gameplay Impressions - Character Creation is Really Good!
In this Fextralife video, I'm going to be talking about my hands-on impressions of The Outer Worlds 2. I got to play this game at Gamescom this year, just a few days ago, and I was also sent the same build of the game after that. So I've been playing for the last couple of days. Just through the demo. a little bit, kind of a through character creation and kind of getting a better lay of the land, so to speak.
